detail:
Darby McDevitt，育碧蒙特利尔开发游戏系列《刺客信条》现任首席编剧。

Darby Christopher McDevitt is a creative scriptwriter and lead writer of Assassin's Creed at Ubisoft Montreal. He was educated in Bellingham and Dublin and lived in Seattle, Washington briefly.
